titles.title: Danielle's Act
A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require staff working with developmentally disabled individuals to call emergency services in the event of a life-threatening situation.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6301)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
5/17/2007--Introduced.
Danielle's Act - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to require state Medicaid plans to require staff working with individuals with a developmental disability or traumatic brain injury to call emergency services in the event of a life-threatening situation.
